faq1.question: How do I register a new resident in the system?
faq1.answer: Go to Residents > Add New. Complete basic information, assign the unit and define if they are owner or tenant. The system will automatically send access credentials.

faq2.question: How do I generate QR codes for visitors?
faq2.answer: From the Access module, select 'Generate QR'. Define validity (hours/days), access type and optionally add a note. The code can be sent via WhatsApp or email.

faq3.question: How do I configure amenity reservations?
faq3.answer: In Amenities > Configuration, define available hours, maximum duration, restrictions and whether approval is required. Residents can book from their panel.

faq4.question: How does automatic billing work?
faq4.answer: Define billing concepts, due dates and payment methods. The system automatically generates monthly fees and sends reminders before expiration.

faq5.question: Can I customize notifications?
faq5.answer: Yes, in Settings > Notifications you can enable/disable different types of alerts, define message templates and schedule automatic sending.

faq6.question: How do I access financial reports?
faq6.answer: In the Reports module you'll find billing statistics, delinquency, payments by period and Excel export. Data updates in real time.

issue1.title: QR code doesn't work when scanned
issue1.description: Visitor cannot enter with the generated QR code
issue1.solution: Verify the code is still valid and the guard's device has internet connection. Regenerate the code if necessary.

issue2.title: I don't receive notifications on my device
issue2.description: Alerts and notifications don't reach mobile or email
issue2.solution: Check notification settings in your profile and verify permissions are enabled on your mobile device.

issue3.title: Error processing a payment
issue3.description: System shows error when registering a completed payment
issue3.solution: Verify receipt data and that the amount matches. If it persists, contact support with the transaction number.
